User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0

When a file is being uploaded through Firefox, the label of the tab says "Connecting..."

It seems like it should say "Uploading..."

"Connecting..." should only be displayed when Firefox is trying to open a connection, not when one has been established.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Browse to a website where you can upload a file.
2. Browse for a file and open it.
3. See the incorrect message as the file uploads to the website.
